titleStmt.title: The speeches of the Kings Most Excellent Majesty in this great court of Parliament with all the speeches of the right honourable the Lord Digby and the Lord Faukeland and the speeches of Sir Benjamin Rudyer.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

titleStmt.title: The speeches of the Kings Most Excellent Majesty in this great court of Parliament with all the speeches of the right honourable the Lord Digby and the Lord Faukeland and the speeches of Sir Benjamin Rudyer.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Includes speeches and messages of the King to Parliament from Nov. 3, 1640 to May 11, 1641. Other speeches mentioned on t.p. are not present. Latter part of the title beginning "with all the speeches" has been heavily crossed out in this copy, probably by publisher. Illegible part of title supplied from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
